Implementation of a small size convolutional neural network using Keras API and Naive Bayes classifier for recognition of handwritten digits using the MNIST dataset. The obtained accuracy is 99%.

### Challenge:
[Kaggle Challenge](https://www.kaggle.com/c/digit-recognizer/overview)

### Code:
1. [Naive Bayes Colab Notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1n_s_kXAlkpAWLirjaNVrwR-c3kmX2epp?usp=sharing)
2. [CNN Colab Notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1J4ZzldXxSX0ElvApJek12oEj1nPO8VAQ?usp=sharing)
